item.description:
Join Kiki, Joni and Rosanne for the

showing of Jane Eyre at the

Dedham Community Theatre at approx.

6:45pm.  After the movier, we will go for coffee and

dessert at the Pancake House / IHop

on Route 1, Dedham.

Please remember to RSVP for this event.

Please check the Message Board on

Thursday and/or Friday Evening.

Kiki will update the board with more exact times.
item.how_to_find_us: Purchase your ticket and look for us in the lobby / theatre
item.why: We all love a good movie!
item.name: Movie / Dessert Night
